DataElement.preferredName: Personal Medical History of Cancer CPTAC Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to indicate whether a history of cancer exists.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Personal Medical History Is there a Cancer History
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies._A question about whether a history of cancer exists.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Property.preferredDefinition: A question about whether a history of cancer exists.

Concepts.definition: A question about whether a history of cancer exists.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the identification of patients' medical records and forms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A national effort to accelerate the understanding of the molecular basis of cancer through the application of large-scale proteome and genome analysis, or proteogenomics._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.
